name: Invesco S&P 500 ESG Tilt Index ETF
longDescription: ISTE seeks to replicate, to the extent reasonably possible and before fees and expenses, the performance of the S&P 500 ESG Tilted Index, or any successor thereto, on an unhedged basis, in the case of any unhedged units, or on a hedged basis, in the case of any hedged units In order to achieve its investment objective, ISTE currently holds the Constituent Securities of the S&P 500 ESG Tilted Index in approximately the same proportion as they are reflected in that Index and may use, at the discretion of Invesco Capital, the sampling methodology described in the prospectus. In addition, or in the alternative, ISTE may hold securities of one or more Invesco portfolios that, individually or collectively, replicate or substantially replicate the applicable Index.

In addition, or in the alternative, ISTE may hold securities of one or more Invesco portfolios that, individually or collectively, replicate or substantially replicate the applicable Index.
fullAddress: 5140 Yonge Street, Suite 900, Toronto, ON, CA
